text: Richelle Stephens (born July 22, 1996) is an American rugby sevens player. She won a silver medal at the 2015 Pan American Games as a member of the United States women's national rugby sevens team. ==References== == External links == * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:United States international rugby sevens players Category:Female rugby sevens players Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2015 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for the United States Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic rugby sevens players of the United States Category:Rugby sevens players at the 2014 Summer Youth Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in rugby sevens
title: Richelle Stephens
